q: Google Apps. After all, Google's core business of search can't prop up the company forever. "Google's business group gets good support overall," says Forrester research analyst Ted Schadler. With Google's core search business under attack from Bing and Yahoo, I would expect them to keep investing in Google Apps for Business.
